ROW.NAME: 缴款书的调整类型不一致

ROW.DATDSC: select rownum,t.* from ( select DZSPHM "电子税票号码", DZSPMXXH "电子税票明细序号", PZZL_DM "票证种类代码", PZZG_DM "票证字轨代码", PZHM "票证号码", DJXH "登记序号", (select nsrmc from cj_fxjk.dj_nsrxx b where b.djxh=t0.djxh) nsrmc, SKSSQQ "税款所属期起", SKSSQZ "税款所属期止", SJRQ_1 "上解日期", tzlx_dm "调整类型", (select swjgjc from cj_fxjk.DM_GY_SWJG b where t0.zgswskfj_dm=b.swjg_dm) "主管税务所（科、分局）代码", (select swjgjc from cj_fxjk.DM_GY_SWJG b where t0.SKSSSWJG_DM=b.swjg_dm) "税款所属税务机构代码" from ( select * from cj_fxjk.ZS_JKS where DZSPHM in ( select DZSPHM from ( select to_char(DZSPHM) DZSPHM,djxh,count(distinct tzlx_dm) cnt FROM cj_fxjk.ZS_JKS a where TZLX_DM in ('2','3') group by DZSPHM,djxh having count(distinct tzlx_dm)=1 ) ) and TZLX_DM in ('2','3') and SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%' ) t0 order by SKSSSWJG_DM,djxh ) t

SELECT (SELECT ABS((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T WHERE T.TZLX_DM = '2') - (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T1 WHERE T1.TZLX_DM = '3')) FROM DUAL) AS GX_FZ, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T2 WHERE T2.TZLX_DM = '2') AS GX_FM, ROUND((SELECT ABS((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T WHERE T.TZLX_DM = '2') - (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T1 WHERE T1.TZLX_DM = '3')) FROM DUAL) / (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T2 WHERE T2.TZLX_DM = '2'), 4) * 100 AS GX_BL, (SELECT ABS((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T WHERE T.TZLX_DM = '2' and SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%') - (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T1 WHERE T1.TZLX_DM = '3' and SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%')) FROM DUAL) AS HZ_FZ, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T2 WHERE T2.TZLX_DM = '2' and SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%') AS HZ_FM, ROUND((SELECT ABS((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T WHERE T.TZLX_DM = '2' and SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%') - (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T1 WHERE T1.TZLX_DM = '3' and SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%')) FROM DUAL) / (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CJ_FXJK.ZS_JKS T2 WHERE T2.TZLX_DM = '2' and SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%'), 4) * 100 AS HZ_BL FROM DUAL
